    • Constructor Detail

      • BoxBuilder

        public BoxBuilder(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3 offset,
          com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3[] directions)
        parametric constructor
        Parameters:
        offset - offset vector
        directions - direction vectors, given such that every point of the box can be obtained by a non-scaled linear combination of the direction vectors
